title: Similac Pro-Advance Infant Formula with Iron, with 2'-FL HMO, For Immune Support, Baby Formula, Powder, 30.8 ounces

description.detailed:
• #1 BRAND FOR IMMUNE SUPPORT: Similac Pro-Advance is the first infant formula with 2’- FL HMO* designed to be closer than over to breast milk. (*not for human milk)
  • NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones† (†No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows)
  • REDUCED FUSSINESS: Parents reported‡ reduced fussiness, gassiness, and spit-up after 1 day (‡After switching to Similac Pro-Advance)
  • TRUSTED: Similac is the #1 infant formula brand chosen by moms* and the #1 brand fed in hospitals (*total US infant formula all outlets as of 3/31/18, Nielsen data)
  • BRAIN & EYE DEVELOPMENT: Our exclusive blend of DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E – nutrients also found in breast milk – helps support baby’s overall growth and brain and eye development
description.short:
• Has 2' FL HMO for Immune Support
  • Non-GMO*
  • Supports Brain & Eye Development
  • #1 Brand Chosen by Parents
  • #1 Brand Fed in Hospitals

title: Similac NeoSure Infant Formula with Iron, For Babies Born Prematurely, Powder, 22.8 oz (4 Count)

description.detailed:
• Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormone* (*no significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows)
  • Similac NeoSure promotes excellent catch-up growth in your premature baby including better gains in weight, length and head circumference when compared to premature babies fed term infant formulas
  • An easy-to-digest milk-based formula that contains increased protein, energy, vitamins and minerals compared to standard infant formula as well as extra calories for growth in baby's first year
  • The only nutrient-enriched formula for preterm infants with data to show it promoted greater rates of growth than a term infant formula during the first year of life for babies born prematurely
  • Includes DHA and ARA, special nutrients found in breast milk that are important for helping support brain and eye development and calcium and phosphorus for baby's growing bones
description.short:
• Promotes excellent catch up growth during your preterm baby's first year
  • #1 Infant Formula brand chosen by Parents

Parent's Choice Non-GMO Premium Infant Formula with Iron, 36 oz:
  • Compare to the Nutrition of Enfamil Premium® Infant*
  • Milk-based infant formula with iron for babies 0-12 months
  • Closer to breast milk
  • Parent's choice milk-based infant formula contains DHA, dual prebiotics, vitamins & minerals
  • Non-GMO (ingredients not genetically engineered)
  • Gluten-free
  • Stage 1 formula is suitable for age infant up to 12 months
  • Available in 12.5 oz, 22.2 oz, 35 oz and 35 oz 4-pack quantities
description.short:
• Nutrition tailored for infants

  • Compare to the nutrition of Enfamil Infant Non-GMO
  • Our closest formula to breast milk

Clinically proven to support growth and development with DHA & Choline, which are nutrients found in breast milk. This Parent's Choice Infant Formula, VALUE SIZE 35 oz, makes approximately 65, 4 oz bottles of formula.

title: Parent's Choice Added Rice Starch Non-Gmo* Infant Formula, 32.2 oz

description.detailed:
Parent's Choice Added Rice Starch Non-GMO* Infant Formula Milk-Based Powder with Iron, 32.2 oz:

  • REDUCES SPIT UP: Added rice starch thickens formula to help babies with tummies prone to excessive spit-ups or reflux; helps babies keep food down and feeling fuller. Compare to the nutrition of Enfamil A.R.® & Similac® For Spit-Up*
  • TOP INGREDIENTS: Added Rice Starch Infant Formula is a milk-based powder formula with Choline and DHA, an omega-3 fatty acid for brain development; dual prebiotics to promote baby's digestive health; iron-fortified for growth; for ages 0-12 months
  • COMPLETE NUTRITION for ages 0-12 months. Contains a special blend of ingredients for brain, immunity, growth and development. Added Rice Starch Formula provides nutrition that is more balanced than simply adding rice cereal to infant formula 
  • NO COMPROMISE: All baby formulas sold in the U.S. must meet FDA requirements under the Infant Formula Act. Parents can trust the nutrition of store brand infant formulas
  • NON-GMO**, ingredients not genetically engineered. **The product may contain trace levels of genetically engineered material, such as from process source and manufacturing environments

  • TOP INGREDIENTS: Added Rice Starch Infant Formula is a milk-based powder formula with Choline and DHA, an omega-3 fatty acid for brain development; dual prebiotics to promote baby's digestive health; iron-fortified for growth; for ages 0-12 months

title: Parent's Choice Soy-Based Powder Infant Formula with Iron, 22 oz

description.detailed:
Parent's Choice Soy-Based Powder Infant Formula with Iron, 22 Oz:
About soy infant formula
  • Compare to the Nutrition of Similac Soy Isomil and Enfamil ProSobee
  • Gluten-free infant formula is made for fussiness and gas
  • DHA, Lutein, Vitamin E
  • Soy-based infant formula is gluten-free and suitable for vegetarian diets
  • Certified Kosher by the Orthodox Union—(U) Pareve
  • Lactose-free
  • Easy to prepare

Soy protein offers a vegetarian-based alternative to the milk proteins commonly found in most infant formulas. While most babies can tolerate milk-based proteins, soy protein is recommended by pediatricians for some infants.
description.short:
• Compare to the Nutrition of Similac® Soy Isomil® & Enfamil® ProSobee®*
  • For Fussiness and Gas
  • DHA, Lutein, Vitamin E
  • Gluten Free and Suitable for Vegetarian Diets
  • Certified Kosher by the Orthodox Union?(U) Pareve
description.medium: Parent(')s Choice Soy Powder Formula is a lactose-free, soy-based infant formula that can help reduce fussiness and gas. It meets all the nutritional needs of infants who either prefer or have been recommended soy-based formula. Parent(')s Choice Soy contains DHA, choline, lutein and vitamin E. It has a unique blend of nutrients which supports growth and development of your baby(')s brain and eyes. Parent(')s Choice Soy is suitable for babies from birth through 12 months.

Enfamil Gentlease NeuroPro Baby Formula

6 Ready-to-Use 8 fl oz Bottles

  • Get brain building nutrition inspired by breast milk? from the formula brand that's #1 recommended by Pediatricians.
